# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Stone furnace at position (41.0, -80.0)
- Burner inserter at position (39.5, -79.5)
- Burner inserter at position (41.5, -78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position (60.0, -60.0)
Consists of the following entity:
- Stone furnace at position (60.0, -60.0)

### Power generation structure at position (106.5, -32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump at position (106.5, -32.5)
- Boiler at position (111.5, -32.0)
- Steam engine at position (117.5, -30.5)
- Pipe group at position (107.5, -34.5)
- Pipe group at position (105.5, -32.5)

### Electricity distribution structure at position (114.5, -28.666666666666668)

- Electricity group at position (114.5, -28.666666666666668)

### Transport belt structure at position (40.5, -83.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Belt group at position (40.5, -83.5)
- Transport belt at position (63.5, -53.5)
- Transport belt at position (64.5, -53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors due to lack of fuel
- Ensure that burner mining drills, stone furnaces, and boilers have a sufficient fuel supply before operation.
- Regularly check the fuel levels of these entities to prevent downtime.

### Errors due to lack of ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have the necessary ingredients for production before operation.
- Regularly check the ingredient levels of these entities to prevent downtime.

### Errors due to disconnection from the electric network
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electric network before operation.
- Regularly check the connection status of these entities to prevent downtime.

### Errors due to empty or full pipe groups
- Ensure that pipe groups are not empty or full before operation.
- Regularly check the status of pipe groups to prevent downtime.

### Errors due to waiting for source items
- Ensure that burner inserters have a sufficient source of items before operation.
- Regularly check the source item levels of these entities to prevent downtime.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
The agent has not invoked any functions, so there are no failure or success modes to report.
